text: Little Brother () is a 1927 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.Составлен список из 557 навсегда утраченных отечественных фильмовГосфильмофонд обнародовал самые значимые потери отечественного кинематографа It stars Emil Gal, Sergey Gerasimov, and Tatyana Guretskaya. ==Actors== * Emil Gal as Worker of the port * Sergey Gerasimov * Tatyana Guretskaya as Conductor * Andrei Kostrichkin * Sergey Martinson == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1927 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Little Brother (1927 movie)
